references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, which is the foundation for the TryOffDiff model presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the CLIP model, which is used for image feature extraction and conditioning in TryOffDiff.

references.paper_title: Viton: An image-based virtual try-on network
references.reason: This paper introduces the VITON dataset and the VTON task, which are relevant to the VTOFF task introduced in this paper.

references.paper_title: Image quality assessment: unifying structure and texture similarity
references.reason: This paper introduces the DISTS metric, which is used for evaluating the quality of the generated garment images in this paper.
This paper introduces the SAM model, which is used for post-processing the generated images in this paper.
